original_text:
For Israel and Judah have not been forsaken
    by their God, the Lord Almighty,
though their land is full of guilt
    before the Holy One of Israel.
korean_text: 이스라엘과 유다가 이스라엘의 거룩하신 이를 거역하므로 죄과가 땅에 가득하나 그의 하나님 만군의 여호와에게 버림 받은 홀아비는 아니니라

sentences.original_text: For Israel and Judah have not been forsaken
by their God, the Lord Almighty,
though their land is full of guilt
before the Holy One of Israel.
